uk.co.strangeskies.text.properties

Interface LocaleManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LocaleProvider, Observable<java.util.Locale>, ObservableProperty<java.util.Locale>, ObservableValue<java.util.Locale>, Property<java.util.Locale>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocaleManagerService

    public interface LocaleManager
extends LocaleProvider, ObservableProperty<java.util.Locale>
    Management interface over and associate localizer instance, allowing the locale of that instance to be changed.

    A locale manager is observable over changes to its locale.

      • getDefaultManager

        static LocaleManager getDefaultManager()
        Create a locale manager based on the system default locale, as returned by Locale.getDefault(). Changes made to this manager will be forwarded to the system locale setting, and vice versa.

        Unfortunately there is no standard mechanism to listen for changes to the system locale, so the manager may not stay up to date until it is refreshed by a call to setLocale(Locale) or LocaleProvider.getLocale().

        Returns:
        a locale manager backed by the system locale
